about_the_game:
I'LL fly over a thousand platforms until I get back to the brightly lit place.

The Symbolism Six Scene


Each scene is relative. And you know the first and the last ?

Orchard to Chase


Inspiring by the film Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon, we make a orchard scene and you can run over it on the top of the roof of trees.

A Run-to-all game Playing


Actually 1000 stages is designed to be a walking simulator with some mysticism. It is not easy to keep silence for the long journey, so you may feel boring especially you have less patient.

A Easy-to-win Playing


Meeting, going and wining, it is very easy to win the final. However, somebody feel it is horrible for a 1000 step walking.

Minimalism Style


There no any instrument or even emotion by your role. So if you wish a high-cost game or sufficient story, for example, killing a dragon, rescue a princess, fantasy equipment, you should consider a famous one, which is give a more memorable experience for you.

Collect Your Unhappiness


Sometimes, unhappiness is important for it be an opportunity for us to review ourselves. And both it is possible for playing 1000 stages insides happiness or unhappiness. And 1000 stages will turn your unhappiness to calm and intelligence.

It is welcome for you judgement, critique, interpret or any commentation, which may help many people.

Hints for buying:

It is possible that refunds in 14days in steam. Free feel to refunds if you don't like our game.

This is not a 3D game, the cover is for reference only. The actual effect please see the screenshot.

If you are a student or other person without independent income, please ask your parents, sponsor or DO NOT BUY this !

package_groups.title: Buy 飞跃跳台：冒险！！！ / 1000 Stages : Adventure!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or greater
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Some people's hearts seem to have been stolen. My heart, where are you?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Arabic, Korean
